title: Fuels Tax Rates and Alternative Fuels Conversion
text_content:
Fuels Tax Rates
In accordance with Va. Code § 58.1-2217, the DMV is required to levy an excise tax on motor fuels. In addition to the tax, the code requires a storage tank fee to be imposed on motor fuels sold and delivered or used in the Commonwealth.
Fuel Type

July 1, 2023 to June 30, 2024
Rates per Gallon
July 1, 2024 to June 30, 2025

30.8 cents per gasoline gallon equivalent (GGE)

0.6 cents per gallon
Previous Fuels Tax Rates
To view previous tax rates, refer to
Tax Rates for Prior Periods
.
Alternative Fuels Conversion
All Alternative Fuels are required to be converted to the Gasoline Gallon Equivalent (GGE) before reporting. A list of alternative fuels and their conversion formulas, along with a conversion tool, is available on
Converting Alternative Fuels to GGE
.
